org.cougaar.core.node
Class SignedMessageSecurityManager

java.lang.Object
  org.cougaar.core.node.SignedMessageSecurityManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageSecurityManager
public class SignedMessageSecurityManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageSecurityManager

A useful MessageSecurityManager which signs each message, but depends on the destination to recover the public key of the sender.

Constructor Summary
SignedMessageSecurityManager()
           
 
Method Summary
 Message secureMessage(Message m)
          Returns a message which has been cryptologically secured.
 Message unsecureMessage(SecureMessage m)
          Reverse the transform that secureMessage does, using whatever techniques are needed to verify the integrity and source of the message.

Method Detail

secureMessage

public Message secureMessage(Message m)
Description copied from interface: MessageSecurityManager
Returns a message which has been cryptologically secured. Implementations may destructively modify the original message in order to actually send the original message.

Specified by:
secureMessage in interface MessageSecurityManager
Returns:
a SecureMessage marked Message

unsecureMessage

public Message unsecureMessage(SecureMessage m)
Description copied from interface: MessageSecurityManager
Reverse the transform that secureMessage does, using whatever techniques are needed to verify the integrity and source of the message.

Specified by:
unsecureMessage in interface MessageSecurityManager
Returns:
the unsecured message iff validated. Will return null if validation fails.
